snippet.title: Official Trailer! NEW DLC Amazon Fury Part I Available Now on PS4, PC, and PS3!
snippet.description:
New DLC Pack now available! Amazon Fury Part I ignites the Amazonian Civil War and puts Gotham City under siege. Join the fight and travel to Themyscira itself to set things right. Watch the trailer and play DCUO for free now!

Subscribe! http://ow.ly/kZGiZ 
Play DCUO for free now at: https://www.dcuniverseonline.com/?cid=1064373

DC Universe™ Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Comics universe. Create your own powerful Hero or Villain and experience true action combat as you fight alongside and against legendary characters such as Batman, Superman and The Joker, now available for PC, PlayStation®3, and PlayStation®4.

Check us out on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/DCUniverseOnline
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/DCUO
Add us to your circles on Google+: http://plus.google.com/+dcuniverseonline
